author: joe_marino
post: Yount wrote: “Had the Shroud of Turin been proved to be the authentic cloth in which he was buried, it still would have offered few clues.” That has to be one of the dumbest comments I’ve ever seen. If the Shroud were real, it would offer few clues to what he looked like??? That’s like saying the Mars’ Rover is of little help in analyzing the surface of Mars. Some writers don’t even seem to have a basic needed factor : common sense..
title: No one bothered to record his human appearance
